== About Me ==

My Name is Alex Lutz, I currently live in West Jordan, UT and I work for Mountain America Credit Union as a Help Desk Tech. I have been interested/working in computers for more than 10 years now and lately I've been working with ubuntu, open source apps, debian, knoppix, and other flavors. I enjoy working with PHP, AJAX, Javascript, and MySQL. I have a small blog I try to keep updated at http://alexinslc.com - I also have a twitter @lutez
